trans-unit.source: Represents a dictionary of strings that are used to represent the name of an object in different languages.
Adds a key/value pair to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" />.
An array of key/value pairs.
The key is an object of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" />.
The value is an associated string.
Adds a key/value pair to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" />.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" />.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.String" />.
Adds a language and associated string to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" />.
Removes all elements from the collection.
The key/pair to locate.
The key is an object of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" />.
The value is an associated string.
Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" /> contains the key/value pair.
<see langword="true" /> if the collection contains the key/value pair; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" />.
Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" /> contains the specified language.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" /> contains <paramref name="key" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The destination array to copy to.
The index within the source <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" /> to start copying from.
Copies the elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" /> to an array, starting at a specific array index.
Gets the number of strings in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" />.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the total number of strings.
trans-unit.target: Ein Wert vom Typ <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> , die die Gesamtanzahl von Zeichenfolgen darstellt.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.
An enumerator that iterates through the collection.
Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" /> is read-only.
<see langword="true" /> if the dictionary is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, wenn das Wörterbuch schreibgeschützt ist, andernfalls <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" />.
Gets or sets the string associated with the specified language.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: Ein Wert vom Typ <see cref="T:System.String" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection containing the keys, or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" /> objects, in the dictionary.
A collection of objects of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" />.
trans-unit.target: Eine Auflistung von Objekten des Typs <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes the element from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" />.
The key/value pair of the element to remove.
Removes the element with the specified key/value pair from the collection.
<see langword="true" /> if the element is successfully removed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
This method also returns <see langword="false" /> if <paramref name="item" /> was not found in the original collection.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" />.
Removes the element from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" /> based on the specified key value.
<see langword="true" /> if the element referenced by <paramref name="key" /> was successfully deleted; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
A zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that receives the copied items from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" />.
The first position in the specified <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to receive the copied contents.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Bei diesem Member handelt es sich um eine explizite Schnittstellenmember-Implementierung.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: Er kann nur verwendet werden, wenn die <xref:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary>-Instanz in eine <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>-Schnittstelle umgewandelt wird.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized" />.
<see langword="true" /> if access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" /> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, wenn der Zugriff auf das <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" /> synchronisiert (threadsicher) ist, andernfalls <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Bei diesem Member handelt es sich um eine explizite Schnittstellenmember-Implementierung.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: Er kann nur verwendet werden, wenn die <xref:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary>-Instanz in eine <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>-Schnittstelle umgewandelt wird.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot" />.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: Ein Objekt, mit dem der Zugriff auf die <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" /> synchronisiert werden kann.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Bei diesem Member handelt es sich um eine explizite Schnittstellenmember-Implementierung.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: Er kann nur verwendet werden, wenn die <xref:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary>-Instanz in eine <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>-Schnittstelle umgewandelt wird.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to use as the key of the element to add.
The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" />.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IDictionary.Add(System.Object,System.Object)" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Bei diesem Member handelt es sich um eine explizite Schnittstellenmember-Implementierung.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface.
trans-unit.target: Er kann nur verwendet werden, wenn die <xref:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary>-Instanz in eine <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>-Schnittstelle umgewandelt wird.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" />.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IDictionary.Contains(System.Object)" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is found in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Bei diesem Member handelt es sich um eine explizite Schnittstellenmember-Implementierung.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface.
trans-unit.target: Er kann nur verwendet werden, wenn die <xref:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary>-Instanz in eine <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>-Schnittstelle umgewandelt wird.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IDictionary.GetEnumerator" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Bei diesem Member handelt es sich um eine explizite Schnittstellenmember-Implementierung.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Er kann nur verwendet werden, wenn die <xref:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary>-Instanz in eine <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>-Schnittstelle umgewandelt wird.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.IDictionary.IsFixedSize" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" /> has a fixed size; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, wenn das <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" /> eine feste Größe aufweist, andernfalls <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Bei diesem Member handelt es sich um eine explizite Schnittstellenmember-Implementierung.

trans-unit.source: The key of the element to get or set.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.IDictionary.Item(System.Object)" />.
The element with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Das Element mit dem angegebenen Schlüssel.

trans-unit.target: Bei diesem Member handelt es sich um eine explizite Schnittstellenmember-Implementierung.

An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> object containing the keys of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ein <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />-Objekt, das die Schlüssel des <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />-Objekts enthält.

For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IDictionary.Remove(System.Object)" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> object containing the values in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ein <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />-Objekt, das die Werte des <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />-Objekts enthält.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" />.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.String" />.
Retrieves the string value in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" /> for a specified key, or language.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LanguageSpecificStringDictionary" /> contains an entry for <paramref name="key" />; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
If the return value is `true`, `value` contains a copy of the string that is associated with the `key` value.
trans-unit.target: Wenn der Rückgabewert ist `true`, `value` enthält eine Kopie der Zeichenfolge, die mit zugeordnetem der `key` Wert.

trans-unit.source: If the return value is `false`, `value` is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Wenn der Rückgabewert ist `false`, `value` festgelegt ist, um `null`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection containing the values, or strings, in the dictionary.
A collection containing the strings in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Eine Auflistung, die Zeichenfolgen im Wörterbuch enthält.
